channel.title: Paper-Free on LinuxUK
channel.description: Recent content in Paper-Free on LinuxUK

item.title: Fujitsu SnapScan 1300i with Ubuntu
item.description: I’ve been using the Fujitsu ScanSnap 1300i on Mac OS X for some time now in the pursuit of a paperless life but now that I am using Ubuntu more and more it was apparent that I was going to have to get this little scanner working on Linux. Searching the internet threw up a few interesting articles but nothing worked 100%. In the end the steps I used under Ubuntu 15.
